subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Red Sox hammered the Yankees for 12 hits Friday, seven off starter Phil Hughes, who retired 5 of the 14 batters he faced and has lacked velocity on his fastball.
snippet: The Red Sox hammered the Yankees for 12 hits Friday, seven off starter Phil Hughes, who retired 5 of the 14 batters he faced and has lacked velocity on his fastball.
